articles.author: Lili Pike
articles.title: Why China is still clinging to coal
articles.description: Over half the coal plants under development globally are in China, and the country isn’t slowing down, a new report found.
articles.content: A man shovels coal at a mine in Shanxi, China, in 2016. China has pledged carbon neutrality by 2060, but its new coal spree is the latest sign it’s putting off the immediate actions needed to meet th… [+8172 chars]

articles.title: Yes, the Georgia election law is that bad
articles.description: The debate over whether Georgia’s law really suppresses voting reveals just how imperiled American democracy is.
articles.content: Georgias new election law SB 202, which many experts decried as an attack on the fundamental fairness of the states elections, was compared to Jim Crow by many leading Democrats. Now some observers a… [+11980 chars]
